review: The Chromecast works great for what it is.It's a way to easily and wirelessly get what's on your PC browser or Android Phone/Tablet to the big TV screen.It really doesn't do anything more than that.  But for the cheap price, it doesn't need too.  It's always worked really well for me.It's come in very handy while the wife and I are house shopping.  I can use the laptop and look at house while she looks at what I have on my screen on the TV.
